snippet.title: Vinland Tales: A Viking Era Survival game - Gameplay graphics
snippet.description:
Vinland Tales is a Survival Action RPG set in the discovery era of Viking history. While sailing from Iceland, your crew hits unknown lands, and it's upon you leading the clan to build a colony and craft your legacy.

But wild nature and other tribes will not spare your village as they defend what's theirs, and is up to you, king of the norsemen, to protect and expand your homestead, and then explore deeper into Vinland: Fight, craft, quest and rule in this game of strategy, sandbox adventure and building of history.

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.colossi.survival.vikings

App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id6670757150
